questions.quote: The roommate will then offer her friend the requisite sympathy even as part of her cannot help but feel somewhat flattered by her inclusion in the unusual request.
I wish you'd called me earlier, I could have given you my tickets for tonight.
Oh, poor George. Oh, I'm sorry, but I can't stay long. I don't want to run into Doctor Tongue.. Here, I brought you something.  Oh, please, come on.. it was nothing.
And it's their anniversary Friday night. I could send them for a hansom cab ride. Y -- you think they'd like that?
That is it! Mary Hart's voice, don't you see? There's something about Mary Hart's voice that's giving you seizures. Just like, just like, just like that woman in Albany!
Yeah, and you're not going to, because I'm hanging it up. Boys, I'm retiring.
You know, I could probably shoot him from here. I'd be doing us both a favor.
I know what he is. I recognized him. You didn't even notice him.
Oh no, I can't do it. I-I'm not good at these things, I get flustered. Once I tried to bribe an usher at the roller derby, I almost got arrested.
Well, you know what they say. Lucky in love, Unlucky with fruit.
